justification: Proposal centers only on Team A’s need and ignores Team B’s mindset. B is conservative, avoids injuries, values targets/touches, and would be trading away its only reliable, high-target TE for a committee RB and an injured, volatile deep-threat WR. TE isn’t clearly A’s biggest need (A already has a Tier 2 TE). The offer could leave B with a positional hole and misaligned player profiles. Explanation is generic and not evidence-based.
